title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
input_format: An array of integers nums and an integer target.
output_format: An array of two integers representing the indices.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
output_format: An integer representing the length of the substring.
constraints: s consists of English letters, digits, symbols and spaces.

examples.explanation: The answer is "abc", with the length of 3.

title: Merge k Sorted Lists
description: You are given an array of k linked-lists lists, each linked-list is sorted in ascending order. Merge all the linked-lists into one sorted linked-list and return it.

examples.explanation: The linked-lists are merged into one sorted list.
